title: Copy an executable locally and execute it, passing the parameters provided
description: Copys the executable locally, launches it with the provided parameters and captures the output

Executable.description: Full path to the executable, if web-based path (http/https) provided, exe will be downloaded first before executing

Parameters.displayName: Parameters to pass to executable, single quotes not allowed
Parameters.description: Full set of parameters to pass to the executable.  If single quotes are included, the artifact will fail
